title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 411 - Distributors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 411 - Distributors

State Regulations
§ 411.1 - Registration of distributors
§ 411.2 - Distributors' bond requirement
§ 411.3 - Deposit of other security
§ 411.4 - Time for filing a bond, depositing acceptable security and increasing the amounts thereof
§ 411.5 - Refusal to register
§ 411.6 - Cancellation or suspension of a registration as a distributor of motor fuel
§ 411.7 - Notifications of cancellation, suspension or refusal to register
§ 411.8 - Transfer of registration
§ 411.9 to 411.10 - Repealed
§ 411.11 - Repealed
§ 411.12 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 411

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 12-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
